titles.title: Praise My Soul The King Of Heaven

verse.name: v1a
v1b
v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Slow to chide and swift to bless,
Alleluia! Alleluia!
Glorious in His faithfulness.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
God endures unchanging on.
Alleluia! Alleluia!
Praise the high Eternal One.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Gathered in from every race.
Alleluia! Alleluia!
Praise with us, the God of grace.
